data.title: Honeymoon
data.description: An unexpected third wheel puts a damper on Jake and Amy's tropical honeymoon. Back at the Nine-Nine, Terry experiences a crisis of confidence.

data.title: Hitchcock & Scully
data.description: Jake and Charles investigate a case of Hitchcock and Scully's from the 1980s. Meanwhile, Amy's uniformed officers and Terry's detectives fight over limited resources.

data.title: The Tattler
data.description: Jake and Gina attend their 20th high school reunion. Back at the Nine-Nine, Charles helps Rosa with her love life.

data.title: Four Movements
data.description: After Gina makes a life-changing decision, she bestows a series of gifts on the squad. But first, an interpretive dance ...

data.title: A Tale of Two Bandits
data.description: Jake investigates a series of car thefts that point to an old frenemy. Meanwhile, the squad defends their favorite bar from interlopers.

data.title: The Crime Scene
data.description: A promise made to a grieving mother sends Jake spiraling into obsession as he and Rosa comb the scene of a baffling murder for clues.

data.title: The Honeypot
data.description: Holt and Jake become suspicious of a new Nine-Nine employee. Amy goes full-on Marie Kondo to declutter the bullpen.

data.title: He Said, She Said
data.description: Amy and Jake hear conflicting stories as they investigate a sexual assault accusation. Holt refuses to believe an old nemesis is really dead.

data.title: The Golden Child
data.description: Jake helps Amy navigate the complicated relationship she has with her brother, David. Charles introduces some drama into an undercover mission involving Terry and Holt.

data.title: Gintars
data.description: A visitor from Latvia causes Charles and Jake to investigate Nikolaj's family. Holt and Amy bring in famed forensic scientist Dr. Yee to help close a case for Rosa.

data.title: The Therapist
data.description: A missing person case forces Jake to confront his issues with therapy. Holt invites Rosa and her new girlfriend to dinner. Terry overcompensates.

data.title: Casecation
data.description: While celebrating their first anniversary, Jake and Amy realize they've had a communication breakdown over a major life decision.

data.title: The Bimbo
data.description: A burglary investigation at Kevin's university reveals Holt's hidden insecurity. Amy and Terry's efforts to raise morale turn deliciously cutthroat.

data.title: Ticking Clocks
data.description: As Hitchcock and Scully microwave a lasagna for exactly 21 minutes and 30 seconds, the squad races against the clock to catch a hacker.

data.title: Return of the King
data.description: Gina invites Jake and Terry over to her new place. Holt takes an interest in Nikolaj's education. Rosa rejects Amy's offer of a helping hand.

data.title: Cinco de Mayo
data.description: Mayhem and double-crossing overtake the squad as they try to distract Terry from his lieutenant's exam by kicking off the Halloween Heist on a new day.

data.title: Sicko (1)
data.description: Jake and Boyle hunt for a serial killer under the watchful eye of Commissioner Kelly. Terry learns that more money does indeed bring more problems.

data.title: Suicide Squad (2)
data.description: To right a wrong, the Nine-Nine teams up with the worst of the worst of the NYPD. Terry sinks into deep denial about his future.
